channel.title: LyricsX
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description: • Fix NetEase lyrics source (#527). Thanks to @hguandl !

• Add Indonesian, Italian and Dutch support. Thanks to Muhammad Fauzi, cencio1952, Zara Drechsler and everyone participated in the translation!
  • Lyrics filter with regex now works as expected. (#468)
  • Fix a bug where LyricsX failed to read local lyrics with “:” or “/” in the file name.
  • Fix layout issue of karaoke lyrics. (#477)

• New icon.
  • LyricsX is now a universal app.
Bug fix.

• Add Russian and Ukrainian support. Thanks to Yurii Kotov!
  • Fix an bug that LyricsX does not auto quit with music player. (#344)
  • Fix an issue where furigana is not colored correctly on macOS 10.14. (#409)

• Add Portuguese and Korean support. Thanks to Leo Caseiro, pb29 and everyone participated in the translation!
  • Fix an issue that LyricsX prevent Apple Music from quitting on macOS 10.15.

• Add Spanish and Arabic support. Thanks to David M.C., Bilal Faour and everyone participated in the translation!
  • Fix a bug where Apple Music stream is not recognized.
  • Fix a crash when using Audirvana.
  • Fix a bug where lyrics does not write to iTunes automatically.

• Support Swinsian and system-wide now playing application.
  • Add French and Traditional Chinese support. Thanks to loliboso, OPKW, Jean-Sébastien Trudel, Maya dos Santos, alex00134, Chris Lombardo, Fu and everyone participated in the translation!
  • Bug fix and stability improvement.

To use system now playing application, enable Preferences -> Lab -> Use system wide now playing application and select “Auto” for preferred music player.

New

  • Add German support. (Thanks to timaniaTM)
  • Add Persian support. (Thanks to Mark Karamyar)

Fixed

  • Fixed launch with Music app does not work. (#285)
  • Fixed automatic writing to iTunes does not work. (#283, #295)
  • Auto Chinese conversion now works as expected. (#278, #290)

New

  • Support Music in macOS 10.15 (#280) and Audirvana 3.5 (#267).
  • Add Polish support. (Thanks to @senseitbk)

Fixed

  • Fixed Touch Bar lyrics disappear as the app activate. (#227)
bug fix

New

  • You can customize TouchBar lyrics. (#208)
  • Introducing strict search. (#221)

Improved

  • Karaoke lyrics won’t exceed edge of the screen. (#196, #215)
  • Only perform Chinese conversion for Chinese sentences. (#225)
bug fixes.

New

  • LyricsX now speaks Japanese. Thanks to @hououinkami.

Fixed

  • Fixed a crash when adding lyrics filter. (#202)
  • Fixed an issue where selected search result or imported lyrics does not persist. (#203)

New

  • The app is now notarized by Apple.
  • You can drag karaoke lyrics window cross screen.
  • Support iTunes music video. (#166)
  • Add menu item for showing current lyrics in finder.

Improved

  • Optimized for dark mode.
  • Trim leading and trailing Furigana on kanas for Japanese lyrics. (#183)

Fixed

  • Fixed a bug that Touch Bar doesn’t work on macOS 10.14. (#185)
  • Fixed a crash at launch affecting users on macOS 10.12.2 and earlier. (#177)

由于无法通过审核，此版本不会在 Mac App Store 发布。 This version won’t be on the Mac App Store. Apple doesn’t approve it.

New

  • Add support for Touch Bar lyrics. (#33)
  • Add global lyrics offset. (#146, #168)
  • Automatically generate furigana for Japanese lyrics.
  • Add vertical mode for karaoke lyrics.
  • New shortcut for lyrics display. (#117)

Improved

  • Adjusting lyrics offset no longer triggers an instant disk writing.
  • You can set progress color and shadow color separately. (#155)
  • You can double click search result to apply it. (#162)
  • You can easily open lyrics saving directory in finder.

Fixed

  • Fix a crash when searching for specific songs. (#163)
Bug fixes.

New

  • Karaoke lyrics now features word time tag like a real karaoke machine.
  • Introduce new lyrics file format - LRCX.
  • Support Audirvana Plus. (#109)
  • Support font fallback for karaoke lyrics. Previous selected font is used as font fallback. (#62)

Improved

  • Reduced CPU usage.
  • Redesigned lyrics filter, support regular expression.
  • Disable Chinese translation for non-Chinese user.
  • Focus on search window when click “Search Lyrics…”. (#94)
  • Perform Chinese conversion before write to iTunes. (#77)

Fixed

  • Fixed a critical crash caused by incompatible version of Xcode. (#120, #123)
  • Fixed a bug that Chinese conversion doesn’t work properly. (#125)

New

  • You can customize font and color of lyrics window. (#107)

Improved

  • Improved lyrics search accuracy.

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue that menubar lyrics don’t disappear after clicking on wrong lyrics. (#122)
  • Fixed a crash when custom font is not existing. (#121)

You can get sandboxed version on the Mac App Store, or download non-sandboxed version below. There is no functional difference between the two version for the moment.

New

  • Fetch lyrics translation from QQ Music, Kugou Music, and Xiami Music.

Improved

  • Reduced CPU usage.
  • Change karaoke lyrics screenshot visibility will not require restart application.

Fixed

  • Stop searching lyrics for stream. (#95)
  • Fixed a bug that combined menu bar lyrics always truncated to “…”.
  • Fixed a crash while selecting font and preferences window was already close.
  • Fixed an issue that program unexpected prevent iTunes from exiting when “Automatically write lyrics to iTunes” was switched on. (#99)
  • You can scroll lyrics window using scroll wheel. (#104)
  • Fixed a bug that lyrics which contains unicode combining characters was wrongly highlighted.
  • Start with iTunes when iTunes was launched as login item. (#96)

LyricsX is now available on the Mac App Store!

The direct download links are dropped from GitHub. Please install from Mac App Store.

New

  • New designed status bar icon.
  • You can hide karaoke lyrics when mouse passing by. (activated by default)
  • Add a new global shortcut for searching lyrics.
  • load lyrics beside music file now works with iTunes. (#66)

Improved

  • LyricsX won’t search lyrics for non-music content. (#86)
  • Lyrics will be formatted when writing to iTunes. (#79)

Fixed

  • Lyrics file now is saved with the correct name. (#90)

LyricsX for iOS

LyricsX for iOS is in beta stage.

Fill in this form for TestFlight invitation, and join the Telegram group.

New

  • New global shortcut! (#2)
  • LyricsX now can load lyrics beside current track. (only for Vox) (#66)

Improved

  • Improved animation for karaoke lyrics.
  • Reduced network usage.

Fixed

  • Fixed a crash when searching lyrics.
  • Combined menubar lyrics now works as expected.
  • Fixed an issue about marking wrong lyrics. (#70)

Note: LyricsX now requires macOS 10.11 or above.

New

  • LyricsX Lab - try our new experimental feature!
    • Automatically Write lyrics to iTunes. (#48)
    • Lyrics source priority. (#53)
  • Added one line mode for karaoke lyrics. (#37)

Improved

  • Improved performance when locating lyrics line.

Fixed

  • Fixed auto launch issue. (#47, #55)
  • Fixed an issue that karaoke lyrics always shows on program start. (#56)
  • Fixed an issue that lyrics window stuck when status menu shows.
  • LyricsX now can search lyrics for songs which have no album and artist. (#49)

New

  • You can mark wrong lyrics and never search again. (#24)
  • Karaoke lyrics window can be placed anywhere. (#37)
  • You can write lyrics to iTunes manually. (#48)

Improved

  • Reduced CPU usage when no music played. (#44)

Fixed

  • Fixed a issue that helper application requires higher system version than main application. (#50)
  • Fixed a crash that could occur when playing track without metadata. (#49)
  • Fixed custom lyrics saving path accessing issue. (#43)

Features

  • #26 Support macOS 10.10+.
  • #36 Separate menubar icon and lyrics.
  • check for update automatically.

Fixes

  • #25 LyricsX crash while player is stopped.
  • #35 Disable translation in lyrics window when prefer bilingual lyrics is off.
  • #12 Search url unsafe characters failed.
  • Surprising search result sorting.

Features

  • Add lyrics source Kugou.
  • #15 Hide menubar icon 🎵 while displaying menubar lyrics.
  • #9 Music player hot-switching.
  • #17 Auto select now playing application.

Bug fixs

Features

  • New designed lyrics window.
  • Double click lyrics to set player position.
  • Drag & Drop to import/export lyrics file.

item.title: LyricsX 1.0.0
item.description:
Features

  • Display lyrics on desktop and menubar.
  • Customize font, color and position for desktop lyrics.
  • Show and edit current lyrics.
  • Auto launch & quit with music player.
  • Bilingual lyrics and auto Chinese conversion.
  • Disable lyrics when music player is not playing or taking screen shot.
  • Lyrics filter.
